languages.text: {n}Чорда зло улыбается, глядя в глаза Винтерскейла.{/n} "Увы, это невозможно. Я уже принесла священную клятву на протяжении ста лет передавать все доходы от покровительства Футфолу в казну миссии {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ордена святого Друза{/g}. Покуситься на это владение в данной ситуации будет значить покуситься на интересы миссионеров. Желаешь начать войну с Ним, Каллигос?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Чорда зло улыбается, глядя в глаза Винтерскейла.{/n} "Увы, это невозможно. Я уже принесла священную клятву на протяжении ста лет передавать все доходы от покровительства Футфолу в казну миссии Ордена святого Друза. Покуситься на это владение в данной ситуации будет значить покуситься на интересы миссионеров. Желаешь начать войну с Ним, Каллигос?"

languages.text: {n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"
languages.original_text: {n}Чорда зло улыбается, глядя в глаза Винтерскейла.{/n} "Увы, это невозможно. Я уже принесла священную клятву на протяжении ста лет передавать все доходы от покровительства Футфолу в казну миссии {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ордена святого Друза{/g}. Покуситься на это владение в данной ситуации будет значить покуситься на интересы миссионеров. Желаешь начать войну с Ним, Каллигос?"

Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that domain would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. You wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

{n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

languages.text: {n}コーダはウィンタースケールの目を見つめながらニヤニヤ笑っている。{/n}「哀れだな、もはや可能性など無いというのに。私はすでに聖なる誓いを果たした、今後100年、フットフォールを支援して得られる収益をすべて{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}聖ドルスス教団{/g}の使命を果たすために使うと。現状では、フットフォールの財産を侵害することは使節団の利益を侵害することになりうる。皇帝と戦争を始めるつもりか、カリゴス？」
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}コーダはウィンタースケールの目を見つめながらニヤニヤ笑っている。{/n}「哀れだな、もはや可能性など無いというのに。私はすでに聖なる誓いを果たした、今後100年、フットフォールを支援して得られる収益をすべて{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}聖ドルスス教団{/g}の使命を果たすために使うと。現状では、フットフォールの財産を侵害することは使節団の利益を侵害することになりうる。皇帝と戦争を始めるつもりか、カリゴス？」

languages.text: {n}库尔达盯着温特斯凯尔的眼睛，笑了起来。{/n}“遗憾的是，我已经许下了神圣的誓言，要将我在落脚港未来一百年内的所有权利转赠给{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教团{/g}。在这种情况下，侵犯落脚港的财产，就等同于侵犯教团的利益。莫非你是打算向神皇宣战吗，卡里戈斯？”
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}库尔达盯着温特斯凯尔的眼睛，笑了起来。{/n}“遗憾的是，我已经许下了神圣的誓言，要将我在落脚港未来一百年内的所有权利转赠给{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教团{/g}。在这种情况下，侵犯落脚港的财产，就等同于侵犯教团的利益。莫非你是打算向神皇宣战吗，卡里戈斯？”

languages.text: {n}Chorda sonríe, mirando a Winterscale a los ojos.{/n} «Lamentablemente, ya no es posible. Ya he prestado sagrado juramento de transferir todos los beneficios de mi patrocinio de Paso durante los próximos cien años a la misión de la {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Orden de San Drusus{/g}. Dadas las circunstancias, interferir en dicha posesión sería interferir en los intereses de los misioneros. ¿De verdad quiere una guerra contra el Emperador, Calligos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chorda sonríe, mirando a Winterscale a los ojos.{/n} «Lamentablemente, ya no es posible. Ya he prestado sagrado juramento de transferir todos los beneficios de mi patrocinio de Paso durante los próximos cien años a la misión de la {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Orden de San Drusus{/g}. Dadas las circunstancias, interferir en dicha posesión sería interferir en los intereses de los misioneros. ¿De verdad quiere una guerra contra el Emperador, Calligos?».

languages.text: {n}Un rictus aux lèvres, Chorda regarde Winterscale droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Ce n'est, hélas, plus possible. J'ai déjà fait le serment sacré de transférer tous les bénéfices de Castel à la mission de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ordre de Saint Drusus{/g} pour les cent années à venir. Dans ces circonstances, me retirer la possession de la station équivaudrait à empiéter sur les intérêts des missionnaires. À moins que vous souhaitiez entrer en guerre contre l'Empereur, Calligos ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rictus aux lèvres, Chorda regarde Winterscale droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Ce n'est, hélas, plus possible. J'ai déjà fait le serment sacré de transférer tous les bénéfices de Castel à la mission de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ordre de Saint Drusus{/g} pour les cent années à venir. Dans ces circonstances, me retirer la possession de la station équivaudrait à empiéter sur les intérêts des missionnaires. À moins que vous souhaitiez entrer en guerre contre l'Empereur, Calligos ? »

languages.text: {n}Chorda verzieht das Gesicht und sieht Winterzunder in die Augen.{/n} "Das ist leider nicht mehr möglich. Ich habe bereits den heiligen Eid geschworen, alle Gewinne aus meiner Protektion von Footfall für die nächsten hundert Jahre an die Mission des {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ordens des Hl. Drusus{/g} zu übergeben. Das zurückzunehmen, wäre angesichts der Umstände ein Eingriff in die Interessen der Missionare. Wollt Ihr einen Krieg gegen Ihn beginnen, Calligos?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chorda verzieht das Gesicht und sieht Winterzunder in die Augen.{/n} "Das ist leider nicht mehr möglich. Ich habe bereits den heiligen Eid geschworen, alle Gewinne aus meiner Protektion von Footfall für die nächsten hundert Jahre an die Mission des {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ordens des Hl. Drusus{/g} zu übergeben. Das zurückzunehmen, wäre angesichts der Umstände ein Eingriff in die Interessen der Missionare. Wollt Ihr einen Krieg gegen Ihn beginnen, Calligos?"

languages.text: {n}Chorda, Winterscale'in gözlerine bakarak sırıtıyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki bu artık mümkün değil. Önümüzdeki yüz yıl boyunca Binliman himayesinden elde ettiğim tüm gelirleri {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Aziz Drusus Tarikatı{/g} misyonuna aktaracağıma dair kutsal yemin ettim. Mevcut şartlar altında bu mülkiyetin ihlali, misyonerlerin çıkarlarını ihlali anlamına gelecektir. O'na savaş açmak mı istiyorsun Calligos?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chorda smirks, staring into Winterscale's eyes.{/n} "Alas, it is no longer possible. I have already given the sacred oath to transfer all proceeds from my patronage of Footfall for the next one hundred years to the mission of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Order of Saint Drusus{/g}. Under the circumstances, to infringe upon that possession would be to infringe upon the interests of the missionaries. Do you wish to start a war with Him, Calligos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chorda, Winterscale'in gözlerine bakarak sırıtıyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki bu artık mümkün değil. Önümüzdeki yüz yıl boyunca Binliman himayesinden elde ettiğim tüm gelirleri {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Aziz Drusus Tarikatı{/g} misyonuna aktarmak için kutsal bir yemin ettim. Mevcut şartlar altında bu mülkiyeti ihlal etmek, misyonerlerin çıkarlarını ihlal etmek anlamına gelecektir. Kendisi ile bir savaş başlatmak ister misin Calligos?"
